// Fetch journal entries from the backend when the component mounts
useEffect(()=>{const fetchEntries=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('/api/journal');setEntries(response.data);// Assuming the response contains an array of journal entries

setEntries([...entries,newEntry]);// Update state with the new entry
setEntry('');// Clear the input field
